banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: Owning the kitchen again

nodes.whoTheyAre: Einav is the lead Corporate Chef at Unilever’s North America’s kitchens. Her role is to bring culinary insights to both products and recipes as well as help the American home cook put a tasty meal on the table. She uses her Chef’s hat to lend credibility to products that can be an easy solution to creating home cooked meals and building sustainable culinary solution to the question “What’s for dinner tonight”? Gefen graduated and taught at the Institute of Culinary Education in NYC.

videoData.description: For many parents, 4:30 pm is crunch-time. Kids are running amok and the pressure is on to make a dinner that will satisfy the whole family. Through her own personal story, Einav Gefen, corporate Chef of Unilever, explains what we can do to make 4:30 a little less challenging and why convenience is not a dirty word.
